description: The nine-year-old `daughter` of Midarezaki family. Comes from `Demon`s Family` Himemiya, she was continuously abused by her family according to their tradition called `Solitary Doll`, especially by her biological sister. The act of Solitary Doll was developed to beat and abuse the weakest (usually being youngest) member of the family to relieve stress. Despite her past, she has a very calm and gentle personality. Her original name is Himemiya Reiko.
name: Midarezaki Yuuka
